name: BluFish Consulting
description:
BluFish is about branding. Building your brand. Defining your Brand. 
Businesses of all types and sizes rely on us for the expertise of a full-service brand and advertising agency but without the staff commitment, overhead and expense of a traditional marketing agency relationship.
BluFish brings together experienced, talented people and your brand. Whether you're a firm that's struggling to manage project work and numerous suppliers, a corporation that needs to define its brands more sharply or a new business that needs branding and internet marketing services in a hurry, you need to manage marketing resources effectively.  BluFish is a team of professionals that can support, protect and grow your brand, whether in print, traditional, digital media or via the Internet through SEO, web development and more. We can help.
READ MORE...
